alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 4:57AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Aitkin and southwestern St. Louis Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 456 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Brookston, to 8 miles north of Tamarack, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hibbing, Hoyt Lakes, Floodwood, Cotton, Toivola, Brookston, Meadowlands, Canyon, Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, Makinen, Alborn, Culver, Elmer, Kelsey, Balsam, Gowan, Shaw, Prosit, Nichols Lake, and Murphy Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin
